Topic.Title: I just paid 2 bucks for a bottle of Coke at a supermarket store

Message.Msg: Hate to say it, where I work, we get a lot of free cokes, as gifts. Get more than I can use at work and at home. Nice perk for my job. Ha, I don't work where you might think, but, at a hospital where free stuff is brought in all the time for us.

Message.Title: I am Mitt and I approve this message
